page.title: 07N.F.U. Mutual Insurance Co.
page.content: Economics. The Head Office of the N.F.U. in the U.K. is in Tiddington. The building was officially opened on 14th June 1984 by Princess Anne.The Company has 16 departments and one of these is Avon Insurance.The Avon insures the farmer's family and possessions as well as having its own Road Rescue Service.Initially the N.F.U.dealt only with farmers and the disasters which they faced but now it insures against many other hazards.The main computer is so large that it is cooled by the fountain at the front and by the swimming pool.The N.F.U. building is faced with Bathstone.It is 120m long,44m wide,and over 16m high. The grounds cover 5.6 hectares. 530 people are employed on a flexitime basis.After work they can enjoy a Sports'Club and the Recreation Ground.
